name: 盧大平
objective:
This course objective is to provide students with knowledge of how modern information technology can help enterprise to 1) improve its efficiency and streamline its business processes. 2) enhance collaboration with its business partners, and 3) gain strategic advantages in the highly competitive business environment. This course will cover 3 major areas of electronic management systems: 1) Functional management systems 2) Enterprise management systems – ERP and CRM, and 3) Inter-enterprise management systems – supply chain management system.
*
本課程介紹電子化管理如何使企業能1)強化企業效率並簡化企業流程；2) 強化與企業夥伴之合作效率；及3)爭取企業之策略競爭優勢。本課程介紹下面3種類型之e化管理系統：1)功能性e化管理系統；2) 企業整合e化管理系統 - 企業資源規劃及客戶關係管理系統；及3)跨企業整合e化管理系統 - 供應鏈管理系統。
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction and why use electronic management systems
Week 2. Foundations of electronic management
Week 3. Advances of modern information technologies for management
Week 4. Strategic usage of modern information technologies
Week 5. Foundations of functional management systems
Week 6. Functional management systems: Accounting and Finance systems
Week 7. Functional management systems: Operation support information systems
Week 8. Functional management systems: Marketing and Human Resource management systems
Week 9. Functional system integration
Week 10. Midterm Exam
Week 11. Foundations of enterprise level management systems
Week 12. System integration
Week 13. ERP
Week 14. Customer relationship management
Week 15. Supply chain management 
Week 16. Strategic advantages of inter-enterprise management systems
Week 17. Journal paper discussion
Week 18. Final Project presentation and class wrap-up
scorePolicy:
1. Midterm Exam 30%
2. Final Project 30%
3. Homework and Casework 20%

materials: Text book: Management Information Systems, O’Brien and Marakas, 9th Edition
